LanguageData.AdRef_ThingDef_AlgaeKryllRaw.label: Algae-Kryll Goo
LanguageData.AdRef_ThingDef_AlgaeKryllRaw.description: A nutrient-rich food that contains high levels of proteins, stabilized with a fine nanowire mesh
LanguageData.AdRef_ThingDef_ElectrodrinkRaw.label: Electrolyte Solution
LanguageData.AdRef_ThingDef_ElectrodrinkRaw.descripti: A canister filled with electrolyte solution, stabilized with a fine nanowire mesh
LanguageData.AdRef_ThingDef_SynthMeal.label: synth meal
LanguageData.AdRef_ThingDef_SynthMeal.description: A synthetic mixture of Algae-Kryll Goo and Electrolyte Solution. Everything the body needs, and then some. Addictive, disgusting, and strangely delicious.
